Integration Configuration.name: OmniScript Integration Configs
Integration Configuration.description: Configurations for OmniScript integrations with developer name, label, and language
Integration Configuration.query: SELECT DeveloperName, IsDeleted, MasterLabel, Language FROM OmniIntegrationProcConfig

Integration Configuration.name: Integration Provider Definitions
Integration Configuration.description: Definitions for integration providers, including input/output processors and external service details
Integration Configuration.query: SELECT Id, MasterLabel, DeveloperName, Description, Type, FileBasedApexClass, IsActive, ExternalServiceOperationName, JavaClassName, InputDataProcessor.DeveloperName, OutputDataProcessor.DeveloperName FROM IntegrationProviderDef

Fulfillment Workspaces.name: Workspace Items
Fulfillment Workspaces.description: Items assigned to fulfillment workspaces, linked to step definition groups
Fulfillment Workspaces.query: SELECT Name, FulfillmentWorkspace.Name, FulfillmentStepDefinitionGroup.Name, ShowOrder FROM FulfillmentWorkspaceItem

Product Fulfillment Rules.name: Product Decomposition Rules
Product Fulfillment Rules.description: Rules for decomposing source products into destination products, with priority
Product Fulfillment Rules.query: SELECT Id, OwnerId, IsDeleted, Name, LastViewedDate, LastReferencedDate, SourceProduct.ProductCode, DestinationProduct.ProductCode, Priority, SourceProductClassification.Code FROM ProductFulfillmentDecompRule

Product Fulfillment Rules.name: Product Fulfillment Scenarios
Product Fulfillment Rules.description: Scenarios linking products and classifications to fulfillment step groups
Product Fulfillment Rules.query: SELECT OwnerId, IsDeleted, Name, LastViewedDate, LastReferencedDate, FulfillmentStepDefnGroup.Name, Product.ProductCode, Action, ProductClassification.Code, ProductId, ProductClassificationId FROM ProductFulfillmentScenario

Fulfillment Step Definitions.name: Step Definition Groups
Fulfillment Step Definitions.description: Groups of fulfillment step definitions by usage type
Fulfillment Step Definitions.query: SELECT Id, OwnerId, IsDeleted, Name, LastViewedDate, LastReferencedDate, UsageType FROM FulfillmentStepDefinitionGroup

Fulfillment Step Definitions.name: Fulfillment Step Definitions
Fulfillment Step Definitions.description: Detailed step definitions including type, scope, OmniScript, and integration details
Fulfillment Step Definitions.query: SELECT Id, IsDeleted, Name, ForcePlanFreezeDuringExecution, StepDefinitionGroup.Name, Scope, ExecuteOnRule.Name, FlowDefinitionName, StepType, IntegrationDefinitionName.MasterLabel, AssignedToId, ResumeOnRuleId, RunAsUser.Id, UsageType, OmniscriptName, IsSkipBranch, TaskAllocationType, IntegrationDefinitionNameId, IntegrationDefinitionName.DeveloperName FROM FulfillmentStepDefinition

Fulfillment Step Definitions.name: Step Dependencies
Fulfillment Step Definitions.description: Dependencies between fulfillment steps, defining execution order
Fulfillment Step Definitions.query: SELECT Id, IsDeleted, Name, FulfillmentStepDefinitionId, DependsOnStepDefinitionId, DependencyScope, FulfillmentStepDefinition.Name, DependsOnStepDefinition.Name FROM FulfillmentStepDependencyDef

Fulfillment Rules & Policies.name: Jeopardy Rules
Fulfillment Rules & Policies.description: Rules for monitoring step execution time with thresholds and durations
Fulfillment Rules & Policies.query: SELECT Id, OwnerId, IsDeleted, Name, LastViewedDate, LastReferencedDate, StepType, IntegrationDefinitionId, FlowDefinition, EstimatedDuration, EstimatedDurationUnit, JeopardyThreshold, JeopardyThresholdUnit FROM FulfillmentStepJeopardyRule

Fulfillment Rules & Policies.name: Task Assignment Rules
Fulfillment Rules & Policies.description: Rules for assigning fulfillment tasks to users or groups based on conditions
Fulfillment Rules & Policies.query: SELECT Id, OwnerId, IsDeleted, Name, LastViewedDate, LastReferencedDate, SourceId, DestinationId, TaskAllocationType, ConditionId, Priority FROM FulfillmentTaskAssignmentRule

Fulfillment Rules & Policies.name: Fallout Rules
Fulfillment Rules & Policies.description: Rules for handling fulfillment errors, including retries and fallout queues
Fulfillment Rules & Policies.query: SELECT Id, OwnerId, IsDeleted, Name, LastViewedDate, LastReferencedDate, StepType, IntegrationDefinitionId, FlowDefinitionName, ErrorCode, RetryPolicy, RetriesAllowed, RetryIntervals, FalloutQueueId FROM FulfillmentFalloutRule

Value Transformations.name: Value Transformation Groups
Value Transformations.description: Groups for transforming data between source and destination types
Value Transformations.query: SELECT Id, OwnerId, IsDeleted, Name, LastViewedDate, LastReferencedDate, SourcePrimitiveType, IsSourceEnumerated, DestinationPrimitiveType, IsDestinationEnumerated, UsageType FROM ValTfrmGrp

Value Transformations.name: Value Transformations
Value Transformations.description: Specific transformations for input/output values, including picklist mappings
Value Transformations.query: SELECT Id, IsDeleted, Name, ValueTransformGroupId, InputString, InputNumber, InputDate, InputDatetime, IsInputBoolean, InputPicklistValueId, OutputString, OutputNumber, OutputDate, OutputDatetime, IsOutputBoolean, OutputPicklistValueId FROM ValTfrm
